Deprecated. The Converters framework has been refactored and this made the deep Converters obsolete 

@Deprecated
public class JSON
extends JSON

A converter that converts domain classes, Maps, Lists, Arrays, POJOs and POGOs to JSON (Including nested Domain Classes)

Author:
Siegfried Puchbauer
